Uses of Package
jGame.core.ui.hud

Packages that use jGame.core.ui.hud
Package Description
jGame.core.launcher
The main package of the framework, where the entry point for every game (GameLauncher) is located.
jGame.core.ui
This class holds a collection of UI-related classes, such as a displayable window or utility functionality to aid in the process of window-making.
jGame.core.ui.hud
This package contains classes responsible for implementing a HUD system, with a central class (UIHud) maintaining a list of elements to be displayed after the game updates.
  • Classes in jGame.core.ui.hud used by jGame.core.launcher
    Class Description
    UIHudButtonElement
    This class represents a "clickable" element rendered on the screen, that could respond to user input.
    UIHudElement
    This class represents a base element to be rendered in the HUD.
    UIHudTextElement
    This class represents a textual visual element whose only purpose is to display a piece of text to the screen.
  • Classes in jGame.core.ui.hud used by jGame.core.ui
    Class Description
    UIHudElement
    This class represents a base element to be rendered in the HUD.
  • Classes in jGame.core.ui.hud used by jGame.core.ui.hud
    Class Description
    Constraints
    Display constraints to a UIHudElement.
    UIHudButtonElement
    This class represents a "clickable" element rendered on the screen, that could respond to user input.
    UIHudButtonElement.ButtonAction
    An action to be performed when the button is pressed.
    UIHudElement
    This class represents a base element to be rendered in the HUD.
    UIHudSliderElement.SliderCallback
    Functional interface representing a callback to be executed when the value of the slider changes.
